transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from a specified address to another address using the allowance mechanism.

approve.description: Sets the amount of tokens that a spender can spend on behalf of the caller.

increaseApproval.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender.

decreaseApproval.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender.

transferERC20Token.description: Transfers an ERC20 token from this contract to another address.

withdrawTeamTokens.description: Withdraws tokens allocated to the team.

setOwner.description: Sets a new owner for the contract.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller to another address.

changeAdmin.description: Changes the admin of the contract.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given implementation address.

AdminChanged.description: Emitted when the admin address changes.

Upgraded.description: Emitted when the contract is upgraded to a new implementation.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specified address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals the token uses.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

creationTime.description: Returns the creation time of the contract.

overdraftAllocation.description: Returns the address allocated for overdraft.

investorsAllocation.description: Returns the address allocated for investors.

advisersAllocation.description: Returns the address allocated for advisers.

teamAllocation.description: Returns the address allocated for the team.

communityAllocation.description: Returns the address allocated for the community.

teamTotal.description: Returns the total tokens allocated to the team.

investorsTotal.description: Returns the total tokens allocated to investors.

advisersTotal.description: Returns the total tokens allocated to advisers.

communityTotal.description: Returns the total tokens allocated to the community.

teamCliff.description: Returns the cliff period for team tokens.

advisersCliff.description: Returns the cliff period for adviser tokens.

overdraftCliff.description: Returns the cliff period for overdraft tokens.

communityCliff.description: Returns the cliff period for community tokens.

teamPeriodLength.description: Returns the period length for team tokens.

advisersPeriodLength.description: Returns the period length for adviser tokens.

overdraftPeriodLength.description: Returns the period length for overdraft tokens.

communityPeriodLength.description: Returns the period length for community tokens.

teamPeriodsNumber.description: Returns the number of periods for team tokens.

advisersPeriodsNumber.description: Returns the number of periods for adviser tokens.

overdraftPeriodsNumber.description: Returns the number of periods for overdraft tokens.

communityPeriodsNumber.description: Returns the number of periods for community tokens.

teamPeriodAmount.description: Returns the amount of tokens vested per period for the team.

advisersPeriodAmount.description: Returns the amount of tokens vested per period for advisers.

overdraftPeriodAmount.description: Returns the amount of tokens vested per period for overdraft.

communityPeriodAmount.description: Returns the amount of tokens vested per period for the community.

teamUnvested.description: Returns the amount of unvested tokens allocated to the team.

advisersUnvested.description: Returns the amount of unvested tokens allocated to advisers.

overdraftUnvested.description: Returns the amount of unvested overdraft tokens.

communityUnvested.description: Returns the amount of unvested community tokens.
